metadata.title: Joanne’s BOOST High Protein Chocolate Almond Smoothie

text: Joanne’s BOOST High Protein Chocolate Almond Smoothie
Rich, creamy taste, long-lasting energy. That’s what Team Homan calls a win, win.
In a blender, combine all ingredients and blend until smooth.
For a lower sugar option, substitute with Boost Diabetic Chocolate (0.5g sugar vs 14g sugar in Boost High Protein)
Use chocolate flavour almond milk for a more chocolatey flavour and a little added sweetness.
Try experimenting with other nut butters like peanut or sunflower.
